name: Joy Pedersen
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: I am here to help you identify and release the hidden causes of your challenges for a more effortless, purposeful, and joyful life. I do this for individuals but also business owners as we can clear and elevate businesses, travel, property, and events to have more effortless success and experiences.
who_you_serve: Individuals and business owners who are having blocks, difficulties, or challenges to more effortless personal or business success.
social_proof: Archangel Michael asked Joy to write his book, which became, "Wisdom Of The Guardian: Treasures from Archangel Michael to Change Your Life". For years, Michael worked through Joy clearing the cause of darkness and karma. Their work has now been featured in the #1 International Best Seller, "Clear Your Past and Change Your Future".
signature_programs: "Wisdom Of The Guardian", "Clear Your Past and Change Your Future"
business_focus: Providing spiritual solutions and healing to help individuals and businesses overcome challenges and achieve more effortless success.
service_provided: Spiritual healing, business consulting, personal growth coaching
